summary: Silicon Valley, in Northern California, is famous for high-tech businesses and innovation. It's around Santa Clara Valley and includes cities like San Jose, Sunnyvale, and Palo Alto. The name comes from the many tech companies there. Silicon Valley is one of the richest places in the world and has lots of million-dollar homes. It's where many big technologies, like microprocessors, were invented. Today, it's still a big hub for tech startups and companies, even though some tech businesses have moved to other areas.
title: Silicon Valley
